summary: REQ-10 (update hero header H1 text to exactly “ShiBhu”) appears to be implemented in HeaderSection.tsx. However, the diff also indicates additional changes outside the requested single-element text update (notably metadata/documentation suggesting an index.html title update), which conflicts with the constraint to change ONLY the selected H1 element and not modify other page copy.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes beyond the selected H1 element, including updating references/metadata to indicate an updated page title (index.html) and other descriptive copy updates in summary/state files.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrained the change to ONLY the selected H1 element and explicitly stated no other page copy should be modified. The diff indicates modifications in other files and mentions an updated page title, which was not requested.
